title: Common Unit Schema
description: A baseline schema for common properties of all combat units.

chassis.description: The base name of the unit's chassis or type.

model.description: The specific model or variant of the unit.

config.description: Physical configuration of the unit (e.g., Biped, Quad, Wheeled, Tracked, Hover, VTOL, WiGE, LAM, Spheroid, Aerodyne, BattleArmor_Biped, BattleArmor_Quad, ProtoMek_Biped, ProtoMek_Quad, Infantry_Leg, Infantry_Motorized, etc.).

tech_base.description: Technological base of the unit (e.g., Inner Sphere, Clan, Mixed). Often part of a more detailed 'type' field in source files.

era.description: The era in which the unit was introduced or is primarily used.

source.description: The sourcebook or origin of the unit's data.

rules_level.description: The rules complexity level associated with the unit (e.g., 1 for Introductory, 2 for Standard, 3 for Advanced). Often part of a more detailed 'type' field in source files.

role.description: The intended combat role of the unit (e.g., Striker, Missile Boat, Juggernaut).

engine.description: Details of the unit's engine or power plant.

type.description: Type of engine (e.g., Fusion, XL, ICE, Fuel Cell).

structure.description: Details of the unit's internal structure.

type.description: Type of internal structure (e.g., Standard, Endo-Steel, Composite).

myomer.description: Details of the unit's myomer (if applicable, primarily for Mechs).

heat_sinks.description: Details about the unit's heat dissipation system.

type.description: Type of heat sinks (e.g., Single, Double, Laser, Compact).

dissipation_per_sink.description: Heat dissipation capacity per sink (relevant for some types).

max_thrust_mp.description: Maximum thrust MP (aerospace fighters, often calculated).

dive_mp.description: Dive MP (aerospace units capable of diving).

armor.description: Details of the unit's armor protection.

type.description: Type of armor (e.g., Standard, Ferro-Fibrous, Stealth).

locations.description: Armor points per location. For Mechs: HD, CT, RT, LT, RA, LA, RL, LL and optional rear. For Vehicles/Fighters: Front, Sides, Rear, Turret or Nose, Wings, Aft.

weapons_and_equipment.description: List of weapons and other equipment mounted on the unit.

item_name.description: Name of the weapon or equipment.

location.description: Mounting location (e.g., Left Arm, Turret, Nose, Body).

ammo_per_shot.description: For ammo-consuming weapons, ammo used per shot.

related_ammo.description: For weapons requiring ammo, references the ammo item name or type.

shots.description: Number of shots for ammunition items.

criticals.description: Critical hit slot allocation (primarily for Mechs, ProtoMeks).

slots.description: Array of strings, each being an equipment name or '-Empty-'.

quirks.description: Special rules or characteristics of the unit.

manufacturers.description: List of manufacturers and their roles.

location.description: Planetary location of the factory (if known).
